english.segment1: My God can never fail. He's been proved time and again. Trust Him you'll see. He's got all the power you need
english.segment2: He's never early, never late. It takes courage and it takes faith. Trust Him you'll see. He's go all the power you need
english.segment3: He saves, forgives and heals. Takes back what the devil steals. My debt's been paid in full. And every day He does miracles
english.segment4: I got dreams turn them into plans. Too big for human hands. Turst Him you'll see. He's got all the power you need
english.segment5: He's real, He's real. Faith's a lot stronger. Than what you feel. He's real, He's real. I'm believing for miracles
english.segment6: Trust Him you'll see. He's got all the power you need
